title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
desc: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
org: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

records.QueryText: Farmer wants to know information about govt. schemes?
records.KccAns: Recommended for to know about govt. schemes please contact rural agriculture extension officer.

records.QueryText: TELL ME APHID CONTROL IN POTATO
records.KccAns: SPRAY OF IMIDACHLOPRID 17.8% SL 0.5 ML PER LITER WATER

records.QueryText: TELL ME SUBSIDY ON VERMICOMPOST UNIT ?
records.KccAns: SUBSIDY ON VERMICOMPOST UNIT = 50% OF TOTAL COST OR MAXIMUM 50,000/-

records.QueryText: Farmer  wants to know information about How to control wilt in chickpea  crop?
records.KccAns: Recommended spray validamycin 15 ml/pump in chickpea.

records.QueryText: Asking about weed control in potato ..?
records.KccAns: spray of Oxyflurfen 23.5% EC 250-400 ml / acre
This week weather is Clear, No Possibility of Rain.
NO CHANCE OF RAIN IN YOUR AREA

Tobacco decocotion
Soak 100 g of tobacco waste in 900 ml of water for 12 hours.Then squeeze the tobacco waster and remove all debris by filter. And Slice 25-30 g barsoap and dissolve in 100 ml of water in another vessel and mix into tobacco solution . Finally dilute with 6 litter of water and spray for against soft body insect

records.QueryText: Farmer want to know information about  Seed treatment in GRAM crop ?.
records.KccAns: Use thairam 3 gm + Thiamethaxam  70 % WS 3 gm + Rhizobial  culture 5 gm per  kg of seed |

records.QueryText: TELL ME ABOUT MANDI RATE OF COTTON  ?
records.KccAns: SURATGARH MANDI RATE OF KAPAS AMERICAN 5050 RS./QT.

records.QueryText: TELL ME ABOUT WEED MANAGEMENT IN GRAM
records.KccAns: SPRAY OF PENDIMETHILIN 30% EC 2.5-3 LITER PER HA AFTER SOWING BUT BEFORE GERMINATION

records.QueryText: Suitable vegetables crops for November – December
records.KccAns: Recommended for suitable vegetables crops for this seasons are Tomato ,Brinjal,Watermelon,Cucumber,Muskmelon,Lab Lab(Bush types), Tapioca, clusterbeans, leafy vegetables, small onion .
